column1: Services: Calling hours will be held on Wednesday morning from 9:00am until 11:00am in the Morello Funeral Home
column3: 3720 Nicholas St. Palmer Twp. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated on Wednesday at 11:30am in the Church
column4: 9th and Lehigh Streets in Easton. Interment will be in Sts. Philip and James Cemetery
